entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -31.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -31.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -35.3°C
Wind: NE 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 31.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
